text: Woodbridge Nathan Ferris was an American Democratic Party politician who served as governor of Michigan from 1913 to 1917. During his time as governor, a wide range of social reforms were introduced.Gov. Woodbridge N. Ferris biographyTitle: Labor Legislation of 1915 : Bulletin of the United States Bureau of Labor Statistics, No. 186, P.187-199 ==References== Category:Governors of Michigan Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:20th-century American politicians Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing
title: Woodbridge Nathan Ferris
